name: Earrings - Rose Hips
description:
These earrings are absolutely whimsy and adorable. They just pop and are so fun to look at. The little red poppy jasper gemstone complement the champagne czech flower bead. The rustic creaminess of the aged looking flower go so well with jasper.

All metals used in earwires are oxized sterling silver. The chain link is actually gunmetal..all the metals go so very well.

They measure a total of 1 and 1/2 inches long in total from the top of the earwire to the bottom of last bead.

Please Note: The earwires used in the main and 3 top photo is the earwires that will be sent. I have no more of the others...sorry.

Thanks for taking a peek!

name: Earrings - Mystique
description:
These incredible labrodite briolettes are absolutely gorgeous! I was really lucky enough to talk my local bead shop owner into letting me hand pick several pairs of these beauties! She only had one strand..that was it.

This is a very unique, very hard to find cut of labrodite gemstone and thus the only pair I will have for sale probably for a long time. The flash blue and green hues are incredible but not always easy to catch with my camera.

The two briolettes are hand wrapped and hang on my very own designed earwires in high quality sterling silver and oxidized. I then hand polished the wire to give it the extra glow that really accents the flash of lights these guys give off.

They are light and only measure a total length of 1 and 3/4 inches long from the top of the earwire to the bottom of the bead. The briolettes are a 12 by 8 mm...nice size. Not too big, but not tiny either! Just perfect.

Thanks for peeking!

name: Earrings - Drops of Jupiter
description:
These are so so pretty! The teal green apatite briolette gemstones and the champagne citrine gemstone dance so happily together with pretty freshwater pearls. I made these for that great prom dress. Do you have one to match?

All metal components are sterling silver and have been oxidized and polished for that extra sheen.

The total length from the top of the earwire to the bottom of the last bead is approximately 2 and 1/2 inches long.

name: Earrings - Soul
description:
Moonstone is such an incredible gemstone to me. I really can't explain its power over my core being but I have a strong attraction to this gemstone.

These beautiful high quality hand picked moonstone briolettes are gently wire wrapped with sterling silver and hang on my very own handcrafted ear wires. I then oxidized the silver and hand polished for that extra glow that enhances the bluish flash of iridescence.

They hang a total length of just over 1 and 1/2 inches long from the top of the ear wire to the bottom of the bead.

I was lucky enough to hand pick a few pairs from one strand from my local bead owner. I will only be selling two pairs of these for now, as good moonstone briolettes are not easy to come by.

Thanks for peeking!

name: Earrings - Cupid and Ruby
description:
They make an adorable couple. This color is just "hot" to me. It displays anywhere from a magenta pink to a sort of deep red. It sort of changes to me. My husband sure likes it!

So here you have a beautiful and gorgeous "ruby" swarovski crystal briolette wire wrapped in sterling silver. I then oxidized the sterling silver and then hand polished for that extra luster and shine.

I have these in other colors, just check the shop. These are just wonderful and hang a total length from 1 and 1/14 inches long from the top of the earwire to the bottom of the bead.

Thanks for peeking.
